itemInfo.itemDesc:
A salad with fruits and veggies. 

- Unique Effect: MP Recovery +5 for 60 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Vinegar
item.desc:
A sour liquid made of fermented grains and fruits.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Fruit and Vegetable Salad, Pickled Vegetables, etc.

item.name: Apple
item.desc: A tasty apple used as an ingredient in Cooking.\nUsage: Fruit Juice, Fruit Pudding, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Apple Trees using Bare Hands or purchased from a special Merchant.

item.name: Cabbage
item.desc: A plump cabbage used as an ingredient in Cooking.\nUsage: Stir-Fried Vegetables, Fried Vegetables, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Cabbage using Bare Hands.

item.name: Cooking Wine
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Vinegar
item.desc:
A sour liquid made of fermented grains and fruits.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Fruit and Vegetable Salad, Pickled Vegetables, etc.
